summary: The Moomins are beloved characters from a book series by Finnish author Tove Jansson. They are a family of friendly trolls who look like hippopotamuses with their big snouts. The white, round creatures live in Moominvalley. The stories, which started in 1945, include novels, picture books, and a comic strip. There have also been TV shows, movies, and even theme parks based on the Moomins, showing their worldwide popularity.
title: Moomins
